definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Now the first bolt of lightning stabs the earth. It is heaven's exclamation point3.
sentences.chinese: 這時，第一道閃電刺向大地，這是天國的驚歎號。

sentences.english: As with many programming languages, an exclamation mark means not.
sentences.chinese: 和許多編程語言一樣，可以用一個驚歎號表示“非”。

sentences.english: An exclamatory sentence should be followed by an exclamation mark.
sentences.chinese: 感嘆句的結尾應該使用歎號。
